title: What can I do if my data is lost after I remove the microSD card?
answer:
Lost data can't be restored. Before you remove a microSD card, uninstall it first. Otherwise, data in the microSD card will be lost.

Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **Storage** > **My SD card** > **Unmount SD card**, and carefully take out the microSD card.
